inn1.comm: Shout for lbw right away. Sliding down leg side though. Lands just outside off, on a length and cut back in, Imran tried to work it to on side but didn't connect.
Nice looking punch drive. Back of length, around off stump, Imran stands up tall and punches it on the up through the off side ring.
fuller, on off and middle, Imran flicks it past square leg
Well outside the off stump, left alone
leans forward and defends a full length delivery on middle and off
Creams it! Full and outside off, Imran Nazir goes back, stands tall and square-drives it through point.
on a length, comes in from outside off stump, punched to mid-off
full in length, on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
on the hips, tries to tuck it to on side and it rolls off the pads
dabbed to third man. It must be the most productive stroke in ODIs. Just lean towards the line, open the bat-face and run it down
tickled away to fine leg for a single
In the Pollock channel - outside off, left alone. Imran thrusted his left foot across, covered the off stump and shouldered arms
fullish, around off, driven to mid off. Wonder when Imran will go for an outrageous stroke.
Full and on middle, Imran tries to drill it straight down the ground, gets a inside edge to square leg
There he goes. Fullish, on the off and middle stump line, Nazir leans forward and just biffs it over mid-on. Boom!
sliding down leg side, Akmal is rapped on the pads as he tries to work it to on side
Slap! Short and wide, spanked high over point. Easy pickings.
full in length, just outside off stump, Akmal opens the bat-face, steers it to backward point
leans forward, defends
steered to point
full in length, outside off, guided to point
Fuller, on the off and middle, Imran tries to drill it down the ground, gets an inside edge to square leg
Swing and a miss. Slower one,  full in length, Imran tries to hit it back to Lahore, and is through his shot early

Pollock screams for lbw, Bucknor is mum. Full-length, slides in towards leg stump, Nazir falls over a touch while trying to work to on side and is rapped on the pads. Hawk eye suggests it would have brushed the leg stump
breaks free! Short of length, outside off and Imran latches on the width and the length, cuts it through backward point.
slides down leg side and bounces, Akmal tries to tuck it away and is beaten for pace. Rapped on thigh pad
Akmal's misery continues. Goes for a pull, off a short-pitched delivery and skies it towards midwicket. Another failure for Akmal.
full in length, around off stump, Younis is squared-up a touch as the ball doesn't come in as much as he anticipated, opens the bat-face in the last minute and runs it down to third man

Ntini nails Imran! Slightly short of length and at some pace, Imran was cramped up when he went for the pull, ended up shovelling a dolly to mid on. South Africa are running hot here, Pakistan continue to blow hot and cold.
short of length, on the middle stump line, blocked
full, outside off, driven to mid-off. Almost inside-out.
honing in on the off stump, pushed out to cover. Does this man, Pollock, never get bored bowling that line, again and again? Awesome fella.
And again on the off stump line, pushed to the off side.
Younis is standing just outside the crease. Full and on the off, driven to mid off
this one is speared in on the middle, pushed to mid on.
lands on a length, outside off, comes in slightly, Younis goes back and across, opens the bat-face, runs it down to thirdman for a single.
on the middle stump line, defended away
They roar as the ball kisses past the outside edge as Younis tries to play a cut shot to a delivery too close to him
Just short of drivable length, on the off stump line, Younis lunges forward at the last minute, keeps it out
fuller, outside off, guided to thirdman region.
from wide of the crease, comes in from outside the off stump, steered to point
comes in from outside the off stump, Younis stabs at it and the ball rolls ahead of his feet
Classy! Half-volley on the middle and Younis chooses to go straight down the ground. The full face of the blade and all that jazz. Looked pretty good.
corrects the line and the length, hits the good length, hits the off stump line and Younis pays respect
Gibbs makes a fine diving stop at point. Punched to right of him, he moves a few steps and dives. The crowd love the effort.
In the zone outside off, left alone
leans well forward, head over the ball, and pushes a length-delivery to the off side
full and on the stumps, flicked away to dee midwicket for a fantastic boundary
driven nicely to the third man region
worked away towards square leg, in the end they decide not to go for the single
good length delivery outside the off stump and Yousuf finds the fielder at cover
edged away wide of gully
pitched up outside the off stump, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
again driven straight to the fielder at mid-off, Yousuf struggling a bit here to find the gaps
line and length delivery, Khan gets behind the line and defends it down
forced away off the back-foot to the cover region
short off a good length delivery, coming in with the angle, Khan shuffles across a long away and clips it wide of the diving fielder at mid-on, long chase saves one run

Gibbs! bit of width offered outside the off stump and Yousuf punches it away off the back-foot to the point region, had four written all over it but a brilliant dive across to his right from Gibbs cut it off
punched straight back over the bowler to long-off
clipped away off the pads to the backward square leg reigon, two more added to the total
good length delivery on the stumps and Younis punches it down to mid-on, once again he fails to find the gap
short and bit of width offered outside the off stump, Khan leans back, makes room and cuts it away well wide of the diving fielder at backward point - top shot
Slower one! Off break, lands on the middle,  the batsman shuffles across and the ball breaks back and just misses the leg stump. Pollock lets out a scream of agony
full in length, outside off, Younis tries to ease back and punch it but is unable to get any power behind that and the ball rolls back towards Pollock.
Full and outside off, Yousuf drives, the bat-handle rotates in his hand and ends up squirting it towards cover
Flicked away! Full and on the middle, Yousuf glides forward, head over the ball and whips it through midwicket. Prince gives the chase and makes a neat sliding stop.
Caressed away! Classy! Full-pitched outside off and Yousuf creams it through extra cover.
Whipped away! This one is again full, again just outside off but Yousuf decides to go on the on side. THe ball came in a touch and hence Yousuf just whips it to right of mid-on
Sliced away! Full and bit of width outside off, Younis slashes it away to right of thirdman. The bat goes the full arc.
worked straight to square leg. 55 for 2 as Pakistan try to consolidate.
starts off with a delivery well outside off, steered to third man

Slog slap! Back of length, lands outside off, comes in a touch and bounces, Yousuf leans forward and tries to pull it away, makes contact with the top-half of the bat and the ball spoons up towards mid on
steered to right of point as Yousuf dabs a length-delivery away
Thirdman comes into play as Yousuf punches a length delivery to him
Too short and too wide, bit of rubbish and Younis clears the bin with a fierce cut.
gets his radar right this time. Fuller and closer to the off stump, tapped away to the off side, Younis thinks about a run, Yousuf is not in the same frequency and no run results.
on the middle stump line, worked to right of square leg
Full-pitched outside off stump, square-driven to cover point
slightly slower, just outside off, Younis leans forward, pats it gently to the off side
on a length, on the off and middle, pushed away to the off side
Fullish, on the middle, worked to the on side
continues with his strangling line and length. Full in length, on the off stump, Younis remains silent with the bat. Just dead-bats it away and players head off for drinks
Drifts on to the legs, flicked to deep midwicket
charges down the track and punches a short of length delivery to mid off, standing at the edge of the 30-yard circle
Suicidal slash! Wide outside off, full in length, Younis decides to chase it and ends up getting a nick to Boucher. Had he left it alone, it would have been called a wide.
on the middle, Inzamam shuffles across, works it to square leg
strays on to the pads, that should have been put away but Yousuf doesn't make contact with his flick
change of pace. Slower one outside off, full, guided to thirdman
fuller, outside off, driven to cover
Inzy shuffles across, is squared-up a touch as the ball holds its line outside off, he adjusts by pushing his hands out, and steers the ball to point
again his shuffle takes him outside off, and then he punches the delivery to cover
beaten! In the channel outside off, Yousuf pokes at it, flirting with danger there and the ball whizzes past the outside edge
strays on the leg, glanced away to the on side
beaten again. Another lame poke by yousuf, again the ball teases the outside edge.
this time he makes contact and guides the delivery to thirdman.
dropped! By Hall himself. Inzy tries to on drive, gets a leading edge and it goes to left of Hall who clangs it. Will South Africa end up ruing this? Can Inzamam make them pay?
fullish, outside off, guided to point
pushed to on side
Slightly short, at the body, pulled to fine leg
comes in from outside off, dabbed away to midwicket
produces the edge but it goes through noman's land. Yousuf is sucked into a forward push and the outside edge takes it through the vacant gully region , down to third man
length-delivery outside off, punched to cover, can't pinch a single though.
full-pitched, well outside off, Yousuf reaches out, square-drives it past point
again that Inzy shuffle, gets right behind a delivery on the off stump, turns it to on side
lands on a length, outside off, punched to cover
overpitched on the off stump line, driven to mid on

Gone! The drop has not proven costly. Again the shuffle has done in Inzy. He moves right across the stumps, the ball lands on the off and middle, came in and the bat came down the wrong line and is rapped in front. It would have taken out the leg stump. Pakistan are wobbling at 71 for 4 as the mediumpacers are doing the job for the hosts.
pushed to cover
overpitched on leg and middle, flicked to deep midwicket
Length-delivery, on the off stump line, Malik gets right behind the line to defend
on the off and middle, worked to midwicket
on the off and middle stump line, defended away off the front foot
strangling line on the off stump, tapped away to the off side
Just outside off, guided to point
overpitched outside off stump, driven to mid off
Outside off stump, full in length, eased to point
on the middle and leg, Yousuf glides forward, flicks it past square leg
On the legs, whipped past square leg. Ntini ambles across from long leg and Boucher is quite unhappy with the lazy effort. Screams at Ntini. Pakistan steal the extra run
driven to right of mid on
tip and run. Steered to gully region and they rush across for a single
full and on the off stump, straight, driven to mid off
on the stumps, punched to mid on
banged in short, just outside off stump, Malik was looking to come forward, arrests his movement and sways away
pushed to left of cover and Malik will get a single.
on the pads, worked to deep midwicket
Full-pitched on the middle stump line, Yousuf plays it quietly towards mid-on. The camera pans to Kemp who is warming up.
fuller, and on the stumps, turned to midwicket
Yousuf breaks free. Full in length, outside off, walloped over mid-off.
ambles in, gentle loosener on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler
pushes this one outside off, dabbed away to thirdman. BOucher is standing up near the stumps
on the middle stump line, worked to square leg
on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
overpitched outside off, driven to cover
overpitched, driven to long on
on the hips, tucked past square leg
bouncer and ducked under
Just outside off stump, delicately guided to third man
pushed to left  of cover and they will get a single
Super bit of work from Pollock at fine leg. Flicked away fine by YOusuf, Pollock rushed across to his right, to make a diving stop.
outside off, cut to thirdman
lands on a length, just outside off , comes back in a touch, Malik goes back, whips it past square leg
Another single to the thirdman region
short of length and outside off, cut to deep point
On the legs, glanced away to right of Ntini at fine leg
delivered with a Sharapova like grunt, just outside off stump, on a length, tapped away to the off side,
No grunt this time and run down to thirdman
Lovely pick-up shot from Yousuf. Picks the slower one early and sends it soaring over wide mid on
on the pads, flicked away to long leg. 50 up for Yousuf. He is in midst of a form of his life.
short of length and outside off, cut to thirdman

ooh....edged past Boucher. lands on a length, outside off stump, sucks Yousuf forward before leaving him and surprising him with extra bit of bounce. Takes the edge and thuds into the shoulder of Boucher, who is standing up, and runs away for a single
full and in the slot, driven to long on
Malik rotates the strike back with a dab to thirdman
beaten. Lands outside off stump, holds its line, Yousuf flirts at it, doesnt' get a touch
lands on a length, slower through the air, on the off stump, tapped to point
Good work by Gibbs at backward point. Pushed to left of him, he makes a diving stop and is up in no time. Yousuf wanted a single but can't get it
overthrow as de Villiers, at midwicket, fires in a throw at non-striker's end
on the off stump line, punched back to the bowler
floated on the middle stump line, whipped past square leg
floated on the leg stump line, worked past square leg
tossed up, low full toss, outside off, driven to long on
just short of length, on the off stump, Yousuf goes back to punch it to cover
good length delivery outside the off stump and Malik taps it away towards point, they think about a single but in the end decide against it - Gibbs does make a difference

bit of width offered outside the off stump, Malik waits for the ball and at the last moment runs it down to third man for a single, nicely opened the face of the bat and allowed the ball to slide off the face
drifting down leg, Yousuf fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad, half hearted appeal for lnw turned down
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
worked away off the back and Yousuf get it well wide of midwicket
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, punched down to mid-on
worked away against the spin to the short third man region
long-hop and Yousuf pulls it away in style to the midwicket fence, easy pickings
close to the off stump line and once again Yousuf finds the fielder at short third man
cut away off the back-foot and this time Yousuf gets it wide of the fielder at point
driven down to long-on
and again, tossed up delivery on the stumps, Yousuf pushes forward and punches it down to mid-on for an easy single
full and on the stumps, driven with a straight bat and the ball races away towards long-on
worked away off the pads to the midwicket region
hard chance grassed! short of a good length delivery, Yousuf goes for the pull and ends up with a bottom edge, Boucher, who is standing up to the stumps fails to hold on to a very very hard chance
eased away on the leg side for yet another easy single
driven off the back-foot to the cover region, yet another tight delivery from polly
worked away off the back-foot to the square leg region, Kallis attacks the ball from the deep and keeps it down to just a single. Pollock's spell comes to an end
worked away with the spin to the midwicket region, Gibbs moves across in a flash and cuts off the single
tossed up and turning in, Malik comes down the track and has a go at it, ball clips the outside edge and goes well wide of Kemp at short third man. The ball was in the air for a long time but....
cut away behind point, they take on the fielder in the deep and Malik comfortably makes it back for the second
worked away on the leg side
too wide outside the off stump
driven down to long-on for an easy single
full and close to the off stump line, Yousuf gets well forward and turns it away towards midwicket. Again with Gibbs attacking the ball they pull away from the single
slower one, he picks it up early and punches it past a diving AB at midwicket
tip and run. Pushes to the off side and they set off immediately
banged in short, Malik swivels nicely off the front foot and pulls to deep square leg
Similar delivery and similar shot. Nonchalantly pulled away.
fuller, on the off and middle, worked straight to AB at midwicket
short of length, outside off, carved to right of Kallis at thirdman who pulls of a sliding stop.
around the off stump, pushed to cover. Yousuf was looking to place it to the left of the cover fielder but didn't get the angle right

Contrary to what I thought and wrote, it has been signalled a boundary. It was refered upstairs and the third umpire Jerling signals a boundary. Still it was a pretty good effort from Kallis.
 Yousuf had square-driven a fullish delivery, elegantly, to wide thirdman. Kallis rushed across to his right and dived full length to make the stop. He must have brushed the ropes
streaky edge through vacant slip region. Full and outside off, Malik shapes to drill it through cover and gets a edge
beaten! In the channel outside off, Yousuf plays inside the line
single to thirdman. The groundstaff are getting ready with the covers.
on the hips, forced away between fine leg and long leg. Will get two.

Malik falls as the rain comes down at Port Elizabeth. Banged in short of length, on the off stump line, Malik, trying to up the ante, went for a pull, made contact with top half of the bat and skies it to midwicket. He had crept to a fluent 41 and was looking good
full and on the legs, flicked to left of deep squareleg
Slower one, fuller and outside off, Younis leans forward, gets close to the line, waits for the ball to arrive, opens the bat-face and runs it down elegantly to thirdman.

Pakistan continue to tumble. Huge wicket. Yousuf is gone. Edging behind. In the zone outside off, Yousuf pushes at it, bat away from the body, and nicks it to right of Boucher who dives low to grab the catch. Ntini is chuffed and why not.
Well outside off, left alone.
Fuller, just outside off, edged to thirdman
Afridi needs 24 more. Starts off with a flick past midwicket.
Clubbed! Full and outside off, Afridi shuffles across and slaps it over mid on!
Carved away! Fullish, outside off, Afridi goes inside out, over cover. It is all happening as soon as he enters the arena.
defended on the back foot
strays on to the pads, whipped away past square leg. Afridi will be on strike. Hall will bowl a slower ball or two. This should be interesting
Afridi combusts! Banged in short, well outside the off stump, Afridi tries to fetch it from there, and slap it over midwicket and ends up swatting it to point.
Well outside the off stump again, Hall is trying to ride his luck but no maniacal response from the batsman this time, just leaves it alone
speared in full, on the middle and leg, tickled past square leg
full-pitched, on off and middle, driven to mid on. Bit of inside edge there, he was trying to go straight
pushed to cover
full and outside off, driven past cover
around the off stump line, run down to third man
crash! Fast yorker, on the off stump line, Mahmood stabs at it in hurry and gets an inside edge which takes the ball to fine leg boundary. Ntini is not amused. Cruel game this.
beaten! Full and well outside off, Razzaq has a slash but is late on the stroke and meets thin air
defends on the back foot to cover
slightly short of length, mistimes his pull to fine leg
slog! Throws his bat a fullish delivery, gets a inner edge which takes it past square leg. He wanted to swing it over midwicket, across the line.
again long leg comes into play.
hit straight to point and they steal a run. Pushed towards Gibbs and they set off, doesn't hit the sticks with his throw and they scramble home
bit of extra bounce and he is beaten. In the zone outside off, holds its line and Mahmood tries to steer it to thirdman but ...
Thwack! Short and wide, thrashed past point
corrects his length, hurls this one fuller, just outside off, pushed to backward point
comes in from outside off, again Gibbs is brought into play. No run.
Wow! Wallop! Forehand down the line! Slower one and short as well, well outside off, Razzaq spots it, and swats it over long off. Flat batted strike.
attempted yorker turns into low full toss, clubbed away to long on
hits the deck on a length, around off, guided to third man. Razzaq is back on strike
Smashed! Short of length, on the off stump, Razzaq, as he does, takes his left foot out of the line and swung it over to widish long on. Super strike.
Smacked! Overpitched and he flat-bats a straight drive. Almost takes out Kallis. The ball scorches the turf enroute to the straight boundary.

on the legs, Mahmood tries to work it on side, is struck on the pads and the ball rolls in front of him. Mahmood wants to steal a single to bring the marauding Razzaq back on strike, sets off but is wisely sent back
can't get this one away as well. Good length, hint on inward movement, on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
he will get his single. Sliced away to third man
heaved away! Full and on the middle stump, again Razzaq takes his left foot out of the line, out of leg stump, opens his stance and hoicks it over midwicket
Yorker, another heave, gets a outside edge and it runs to right of Boucher who makes a diving stop

Valiant effort from Kallis at deep cover. Razzaq slices a full-length delivery, in the air and Kallis ran in and threw in a brave dive as well but couldn't reach to it. Instead he is smacked on his jaw as the ball bounces before him and thuds into his face. Ouch.

right up there, on the middle stump, Razzaq tries to drill it down the ground, bat-handle rotates in his hand, and he ends up scooping it over Hall who jumps up but can only get his finger tips to it as the ball bobs away to long on
Mahmood throws his bat at a fullish delivery outside off, but can't connect
full-pitched, outside off, Mahmood reaches out for it, swats it to extra cover
attempted yorker, ends up swinging down the leg side. Good take by Boucher
gets it right this time, dug out back to the bowler. This is good stuff from Hall. Razzaq is in a murderous mood and he is managaing to keep him quiet

And he strikes gold this time! Fourth wicket for Hall. All you Hall fans would be thrilled. This one was full and well outside off, hint of swing away, Razzaq backs to leg side and has a slash, ends up nicking it into the safe gloves of Boucher
yorker, on middle and leg, tries to work it to on side and the ball rolls away off the inside edge to short fine leg area
Short of length, outside the off stump, pushed to backward point
speared in full and on middle and leg, Mahmood gets his left foot across and plays around the front pad, and sends it behind square leg
Low full toss, outside the off stump, Mahmood tries to drive, gets a inside edge, and it bounces once before going into Boucher's gloves
Sails down the leg side. Wide.
overthrow from a direct hit.  Pushed to point where Kemp fields and fires in a throw at non-striker's end and it bounds away. They steal a single
beaten! On a length, outside the off stump, skids off the track, a lame poke is offered and it passes like a breath past the outside edge
yorker on the middle , jabbed back to the bowler
full-pitched, driven to long on
swinging yorker ends up as a low full toss, swatted to long on
another one, almost at the block hole, on the off stump, driven to deep cover. Damn good over this.
waist-high full toss, outside off, he throws his bat at it, doesn't make proper contact and the ball bobs away to the off side
Crash! Attempted yorker, ends up as full-pitched on off stump line, Rana gets his bat under the ball and lofts it right over the bowler.
Another full-length delivery, on the off stump, drilled, in the air, towards long off
Whack! Full and on the middle, Mahmood wants to swing it over widish long on, gets a inner edge which sends it to deep midwicket boundary!
Yorker, on the middle, driven towards long on and they will get two
another one full and around off, Mahmood biffs it to deep midwicket.
Slashed over thirdman! It was a chest-high full toss, outside the off stump and Naved-ul-Hasan threw his bat it. Up and up she soared before disappearing over the ropes.
